name: The Smokin' Pumpkin
description: Sweet, rich pumpkin ale combines with deeply smoky Rauchbier for a savory, funky two-ingredient beer cocktail that's perfect for fall.
recipeIngredient: 6 ounces pumpkin ale, like Southern Tier Imperial Pumking
6 ounces rauchbier, like the Marzen pictured above

recipeInstructions.text: Combine both beers in a Collins or highball glass and stir gently.
